response.overview: Chickie wants to support his friends fighting in Vietnam, so he does something wild—personally bring them American beer. What starts as a well-meaning journey quickly changes Chickie’s life and perspective. Based on a true story.
response.title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever

titles.title: 史上最高のカンパイ！戦地にビールを届けた男
有史以来最棒的啤酒运送

cast.name: Chananticha Chaipa
cast.original_name: ชนันทิชา ชัยภา
